00036 #ifndef CONSTRAINT_DIV_H
00037 #define CONSTRAINT_DIV_H
00038 
00039 #include <math.h>
00040 
00041 #ifndef LRINT
00042 #define LRINT(x) static_cast<DomainInt>(x + 0.5)
00043 #endif
00044 
00046 template<typename VarRef1, typename VarRef2, typename VarRef3>
00047 struct DivConstraint : public AbstractConstraint
00048 {
00049   virtual string constraint_name()
00050   { return "Div"; }
00051   
00052   VarRef1 var1;
00053   VarRef2 var2;
00054   VarRef3 var3;
00055 
00056   DivConstraint(StateObj* _stateObj, VarRef1 _var1, VarRef2 _var2, VarRef3 _var3) : AbstractConstraint(_stateObj),
00057     var1(_var1), var2(_var2), var3(_var3)
00058   {
00059   
00060       if(var1.getInitialMin() < 0 || var2.getInitialMin() < 0 ||
00061          var3.getInitialMin() < 0)
00062       { 
00063       FAIL_EXIT("The 'div' constraint only supports positive numbers at present.");
00064       }
00065   }
00066   
00067   virtual triggerCollection setup_internal()
00068   {
00069     triggerCollection t;
00070     t.push_back(make_trigger(var1, Trigger(this, -1), LowerBound));
00071     t.push_back(make_trigger(var2, Trigger(this, -2), LowerBound));
00072     t.push_back(make_trigger(var3, Trigger(this, -3), LowerBound));
00073     t.push_back(make_trigger(var1, Trigger(this, 1), UpperBound));
00074     t.push_back(make_trigger(var2, Trigger(this, 2), UpperBound));
00075     t.push_back(make_trigger(var3, Trigger(this, 3), UpperBound));
00076     return t;
00077   }
00078     
00079   virtual void propagate(int flag, DomainDelta)
00080   {
00081     PROP_INFO_ADDONE(Pow);
00082     if(var1.isAssigned() && var2.isAssigned())
00083       {
00084         if(var2.getAssignedValue() == 0)
00085           getState(stateObj).setFailed(true);
00086       var3.propagateAssign(var1.getAssignedValue() / var2.getAssignedValue() );
00087     }
00088   }
00089   
00090   virtual void full_propagate()
00091   { 
00092     if(!var2.isBound()) {
00093       var2.removeFromDomain(0);
00094     }
00095       
00096     propagate(1,0); 
00097     propagate(2,0);
00098     propagate(3,0);
00099     propagate(-1,0);
00100     propagate(-2,0);
00101     propagate(-3,0);
00102   }
00103   
00104   virtual BOOL check_assignment(DomainInt* v, int v_size)
00105   {
00106     D_ASSERT(v_size == 3);
00107     return v[0] / v[1] == v[2];
00108   }
00109   
00110   virtual vector<AnyVarRef> get_vars()
00111   { 
00112     vector<AnyVarRef> v;
00113     v.push_back(var1);
00114     v.push_back(var2);
00115     v.push_back(var3);
00116     return v;
00117   }
00118   
00119   virtual bool get_satisfying_assignment(box<pair<int,DomainInt> >& assignment)
00120   {  
00121    for(DomainInt v1 = var1.getMin(); v1 <= var1.getMax(); ++v1)
00122    {
00123      if(var1.inDomain(v1))
00124      {
00125        for(DomainInt v2 = var2.getMin(); v2 <= var2.getMax(); ++v2)
00126        {
00127          if(var2.inDomain(v2) && var3.inDomain(v1 / v2))
00128          {
00129            assignment.push_back(make_pair(0, v1));
00130            assignment.push_back(make_pair(1, v2));
00131            assignment.push_back(make_pair(2, v1 / v2));
00132            return true;
00133          }
00134        }
00135      }
00136    }
00137    return false;
00138   }
00139  
00140      // Function to make it reifiable in the lousiest way.
00141   virtual AbstractConstraint* reverse_constraint()
00142   {
00143       vector<AnyVarRef> t;
00144       t.push_back(var1);
00145       t.push_back(var2);
00146       t.push_back(var3);
00147       return new CheckAssignConstraint<vector<AnyVarRef>, DivConstraint>(stateObj, t, *this);
00148   }
00149 };
00150 
00151 template<typename V1, typename V2>
00152 inline AbstractConstraint*
00153 BuildCT_DIV(StateObj* stateObj, const V1& vars, const V2& var2, ConstraintBlob&)
00154 {
00155   D_ASSERT(vars.size() == 2);
00156   D_ASSERT(var2.size() == 1);
00157   return new DivConstraint<typename V1::value_type, typename V1::value_type,
00158                            typename V2::value_type>(stateObj, vars[0], vars[1], var2[0]);
00159 }
00160 
00161 #endif
